faqSection.title: Common Questions About Buying a Plot For Sale in Sector 58 Gurugram
faqSection.description: We understand that purchasing land requires clarity and assurance. Below are detailed answers to frequently asked questions about plots in Sector 58.

faqs.question: What documentation is required to purchase a plot in Sector 58 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The essential documents include a clear Sale Deed or title deed showing legal ownership, the latest tax receipts, electricity and water bill clearances, and a No Objection Certificate NOC from the concerned development authority if applicable. For resale plots, the previous mutation record and chain of title documents are crucial. We ensure that every Plot For Sale in Sector 58 we list is accompanied by fully vetted legal documents to guarantee a smooth and legal transfer of ownership rights to the buyer.

faqs.question: Are these plots part of a gated community or are they standalone plots
faqs.answer: Sector 58 offers a mix of both types of plots. Many plots are situated within premium, fully developed gated residential communities established by top developers, offering enhanced security, shared amenities, and maintained infrastructure. However, there are also numerous standalone plots available in well-established blocks, offering greater flexibility regarding construction style and timeline. Our inventory clearly specifies whether the plot is part of a planned community or is an independent land parcel.

faqs.question: What is the typical size conversion for a Marla in Sector 58
faqs.answer: While the size definition can sometimes vary slightly by location or developer, traditionally in Gurugram, one Marla is generally equivalent to 25 square yards. Therefore, a 4 Marla plot would be 100 square yards, and a 10 Marla plot would be 250 square yards. Buyers should always confirm the exact size and dimensions mentioned in the property’s legal documents before finalising the purchase of any Plot For Sale in Sector 58 to ensure accuracy.

faqs.question: What is the current development status and readiness for construction in Sector 58
faqs.answer: Sector 58 is largely a highly developed area, especially those blocks along the main artery roads. Most residential plots here are ready for immediate construction (RFS Ready For Service), meaning essential services like water lines, sewage systems, and electrical connections are already available or easily accessible. We verify the possession status and connectivity readiness for every listed plot, providing you with a clear timeline for starting your building project.

faqs.question: What are the common restrictions on construction height and floor limits on a plot here
faqs.answer: Construction norms in Gurugram, including Sector 58, are governed by the local town planning authority. Typically, residential plots allow for construction up to four independent floors plus a basement and terrace headroom. There are specific Floor Area Ratio FAR guidelines that define the total permissible covered area. These rules vary slightly based on the plot size and colony licensing, and we provide the latest permissible limits based on current regulations for each specific Plot For Sale in Sector 58.

This ensures fast travel towards the IGI Airport and easy access to the NH-48, making it a highly desirable location for frequent commuters and business owners.
